name: Notion Beginner Bundle
description: Limited Black Weekend Offer: Notion Beginner Bundle + Luhmann's Zettelkasten for Notion 2.0 + Networking Hub for only $47Introducing the Ultimate Notion Bundle, a collection of 5 powerful Notion templates designed to enhance your workspace and provide a solid foundation for productivity and organization. Individually priced at $19 each and $95 in total, the bundle offers tremendous value, allowing you to purchase all five templates for only $47, saving $48 in total!The Notion Beginner Bundle inc
features: Habit Compass: Track and cultivate positive habits, set goals, and measure your progress with this comprehensive habit-tracking template.; Workout Compass: Plan and track your workouts, set fitness goals, and stay motivated on your fitness journey using this all-in-one workout planning template.; Positivity Journaling: Promote mindfulness and self-reflection with this journaling template, designed to help you cultivate gratitude, track daily affirmations, and nurture a positive mindset.; Freelancer Compass: Manage your freelance projects, track clients and tasks, and stay organized with this versatile template tailored specifically for freelancers.
